      • getExceptionMessage

        public static java.lang.String getExceptionMessage(java.lang.Throwable e)
        Returns the error message of an exception. If the exception does not contain any error message, the stack trace will be returned.
        Parameters:
        e - an exception
        Returns:
        the error message contained in e, or the stack trace if e does not contain any error message
